name: Sint
summary_text: A horror film that depicts St. Nicholas as a murderous bishop who kidnaps and murders children when there is a full moon on December 5.

name: Phantasm III: Lord of the Dead
summary_text: Mike and Reggie continue to hunt the mysterious Tall Man, discovering along the way that the invasion has already begun.

name: The Bride Wore Black
summary_text: Julie Kohler is prevented from suicide by her mother. She leaves the town. She will track down, charm and kill five men who do not know her. What is her goal? What is her purpose?

name: How to Be a Player
summary_text: A playboy gets the tables turned on him when a party is arranged with all of the women he has been two-timing are in attendance.

name: This Christmas
summary_text: A Christmastime drama centered around the Whitfield family's first holiday together in four years.

name: Le fate ignoranti
summary_text: After a deathly car accident, Antonia starts dating her husband's friends and finds the truth about his life.

name: Moonwalkers
summary_text: After failing to locate the legendary Stanley Kubrick, an unstable CIA agent must instead team up with a seedy rock band manager to develop the biggest con of all time-staging the moon landing.

name: The Mod Squad
summary_text: Three problem teens sent to jail are offered a deal to work with an undercover cop, uncover an intricate drug ring and are caught in a deadly set-up. With cops on their trail, they have little time to solve the case and clear their names.

name: Phat Girlz
summary_text: An edgy comedy about two frustrated plus-size women obsessed with their weight while struggling to find love and acceptance in a world full of "hot bodied" babes.

name: Foxfire
summary_text: Legs Sadovsky gets four other high school girls to think for themselves and react to a teacher's sexual harassment, which gets them suspended. They bond, and rebel, at an abandoned house.

name: Like Crazy
summary_text: Two quite different women escape a mental institution to see Tuscany in a stolen car and get to know each other.

name: Tourist Trap
summary_text: A group of young friends stranded at a secluded roadside museum are stalked by a masked assailant who uses his telekenetic powers to control the attraction's mannequins.

name: It Came from Outer Space
summary_text: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

name: Precious Cargo
summary_text: A crime boss tries to make off with loot that belongs to another thief.

name: Rock-A-Doodle
summary_text: In order to defeat the Grand Duke of Owls, a young boy transformed into a cat teams up with a group of barnyard animals to find a rooster who can raise the sun.

name: The Ballad of Cable Hogue
summary_text: A hobo accidentally stumbles onto a water spring, and creates a profitable way station in the middle of the desert.

name: Osama
summary_text: After the rise of the Taliban in Afghanistan and the restriction of women in public life, a pre-teen girl is forced to masquerade as a boy in order to find work to support her mother and grandmother.

name: Three Wishes for Cinderella
summary_text: Life changes dramatically for a Czech housemaid when the house driver gives her three magical hazel nuts.

name: Wasp Network
summary_text: The story of five Cuban political prisoners who had been imprisoned by the United States since the late 1990s on charges of espionage and murder.

name: Mother India
summary_text: In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, always sticks to her own moral code.

name: Nativity!
summary_text: An uptight but secretly heartbroken primary school teacher's little white lie about Hollywood coming to see his class' nativity play grows like wildfire in his rag-tag school low on self-esteem.

name: Sea Fever
summary_text: The crew of a West of Ireland trawler, marooned at sea, struggle for their lives against a growing parasite in their water supply.

name: As Tears Go By
summary_text: Mid-level gangster Wah falls in love with his beautiful cousin, but must also continue to protect his volatile partner-in-crime and friend, Fly.

name: Boxcar Bertha
summary_text: During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on the management of a railroad.

name: I Still See You
summary_text: Set ten years after an apocalyptic event that killed millions and left the world inhabited by ghosts.

name: Mozart and the Whale
summary_text: A love story between two savants with Asperger's syndrome, a kind of autism, whose conditions sabotage their budding relationship.

name: Into the Grizzly Maze
summary_text: Two estranged brothers reunite at their childhood home in the Alaskan wild. They set out on a two-day hike and are stalked by an unrelenting grizzly bear.

name: Doctor Dolittle
summary_text: After the animal communicating veterinarian goes too far for his clientele, he and his friends escape their hometown to the sea in search of the Great Pink Sea Snail.

name: Santa Claus Is a Stinker
summary_text: Two neurotics, working for a suicide hotline on the night of Christmas Eve, get caught up in a catastrophe when a pregnant woman, her abusive boyfriend, and a transvestite visit their office.

name: Okkadu
summary_text: A Kabbadi player rescues a young woman from an unwanted marriage and hides her in his home.

name: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
summary_text: A man is reunited with his childhood friend and her husband, who believe he knows the truth about the death of her rich aunt years earlier.

name: Black Rock
summary_text: Three childhood friends set aside their personal issues and reunite for a girls' weekend on a remote island off the coast of Maine. One wrong move turns their weekend getaway into a deadly fight for survival.

name: Smiley
summary_text: After discovering an urban legend of a demented serial killer, who has nothing but a carved "smiley" on his face, a mentally fragile teenager must figure out if she is going insane - or if she could be the next victim.

name: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
summary_text: Fate plays a vital role in connecting the life of Bantu, a son who seeks validation from his cold-hearted father with the life of Raj, whose millionaire father wishes that he was more assertive.

name: Satan
summary_text: A group of youngsters go out to a disco on Christmas Eve and accidentally run into a shepherd who has prepared himself for a night of pure insanity.

name: The Black Balloon
summary_text: All Thomas wants is a normal adolescence but his autistic brother, Charlie, thwarts his every opportunity. Will Thomas, with the help of his girlfriend, Jackie, accept his brother?

name: Ewoks: The Battle for Endor
summary_text: Marauders raid the Ewok village and steal a power supply they believe to be magical. Wicket helps Cindel escape the evil witch Charal, and they befriend a hermit who may help them save the village.

name: Phantom
summary_text: A disgraced Indian soldier carries out a series of assassinations in the hope of restoring his honour.

name: A Letter to Three Wives
summary_text: A letter is addressed to three wives from their "best friend" Addie Ross, announcing that she is running away with one of their husbands - but she does not say which one.

name: Rebel in the Rye
summary_text: The life of celebrated but reclusive author, J.D. Salinger, who gained worldwide fame with the publication of his novel, "The Catcher in the Rye".

name: The Pawnbroker
summary_text: A Jewish pawnbroker, victim of Nazi persecution, loses all faith in his fellow man until he realizes too late the tragedy of his actions.

name: Fear City: A Family-Style Comedy
summary_text: A second-class horror movie has to be shown at Cannes Film Festival, but, before each screening, the projectionist is killed by a mysterious fellow, with hammer and sickle, just as it happens in the film to be shown.

name: Shattered
summary_text: After a horrific car wreck leaves him an amnesiac, a man slowly begins to unravel his shocking past.

name: Arthur et la vengeance de Maltazard
summary_text: Arthur answers a distress call from Princess Selenia, who is menaced by the nefarious Maltazard.

name: The Happiness of the Katakuris
summary_text: A family moves to the country to run a rustic mountain inn when, to their horror, the customers begin befalling sudden and unlikely fates.

name: Bol
summary_text: A female convict on death row, her last wish is to tell her story to the media.

name: Breakthrough
summary_text: When her 14-year-old son drowns in a lake, a faithful mother prays for him to come back from the brink of death and be healed.

name: Revolt
summary_text: An amnesiac US soldier's in a cell next to a cute, French doctor. Earth is under attack by big, alien robots. Kenyan soldiers come to rape, torture and kill but the 2 fight back. They find a car and head west.

name: Paradise: Love
summary_text: Teresa, a fifty-year-old Austrian mother, travels to the paradise of the beaches of Kenya, seeking out love from African boys. But she must confront the hard truth that on the beaches of Kenya, love is a business.

name: Eulogy
summary_text: A black comedy that follows three generations of a family, who come together for the funeral of the patriarch - unveiling a litany of family secrets and covert relationships.

name: Un plan parfait
summary_text: A successful woman in love tries to break her family curse of every first marriage ending in divorce, by dashing to the alter with a random stranger before marrying her boyfriend.

name: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
summary_text: A year has passed since Guts parted ways with Griffith. The Band of the Hawks is plotting a rescue mission to save Griffith who is confined to prison.

name: Inconceivable
summary_text: A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town where she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her.

name: Brown Sugar
summary_text: Friends since childhood, a magazine editor and a hip-hop record executive stumble into romantic territory.

name: Bed & Board
summary_text: Antoine Doinel works dying flowers in the courtyard outside his apartment. He is married to Christine, who is pregnant. He has an affair with a Japanese woman, jeopardising his marriage.

name: Come Play
summary_text: A monster named Larry manifests itself through smart phones and mobile devices. Feature film version of the 2017 short film.

name: Kurtlar Vadisi: Filistin
summary_text: Polat Alemdar and his crew is in Palestine and fight against Israel special agents.

name: Malang
summary_text: Advait visits Goa where he meets Sara, a free-spirited girl who lives life unshackled. Opposites attract and all goes well until life turns upside down. Years later, Advait is on a killing spree with cops Aghase and Michael in his way.

name: Breathless
summary_text: When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate - but when will it end?

name: Fled
summary_text: Two prisoners chained together flee during an escape attempt gone bad.

name: The Houses October Built
summary_text: Five friends are stalked by a group of mysterious and disturbed individuals while on a road trip looking for the ultimate haunted house attraction.

name: Always
summary_text: A love story centered on ex-boxer Chul-min and a blind telemarketer Jung-hwa.

name: Time to Leave
summary_text: A fashion photographer with terminal cancer elects to die alone, preparing others to live past him rather than prolong the inevitable with chemotherapy or be smothered in sympathy by those who know him.

name: Nekromantik
summary_text: A street sweeper who cleans up after grisly accidents brings home a full corpse for him and his wife to enjoy sexually, but is dismayed to see that his wife prefers the corpse over him.

name: True History of the Kelly Gang
summary_text: Based on Peter Carey's novel. The story of Australian bushranger Ned Kelly and his gang as they flee from authorities during the 1870s.

name: The Wood
summary_text: While dealing with a friend's cold feet on his wedding day, a writer reminisces about his youth with his best friends.

name: Boot Camp
summary_text: A group of at-risk teens are sent to a what they think is a rehabilitation program on Fiji, but it's really a prison-like camp where kids are abused and brainwashed.

name: The Official Story
summary_text: During the final months of Argentinian Military Dictatorship in 1983, a high school teacher sets out to find out who the mother of her adopted daughter is.

name: The Fire Within
summary_text: Depressed Alain Leroy leaves the clinic where he was detoxified. He meets friends, acquaintances and women, trying to find a reason to continue living. Will this help him?

name: 3 Godfathers
summary_text: Three outlaws on the run risk their freedom and their lives to return a newborn to civilization.

name: The Frisco Kid
summary_text: A Polish rabbi wanders through the Old West on his way to lead a synagogue in San Francisco. On the way he is nearly burnt at the stake by Indians and almost killed by outlaws.

name: Alien Raiders
summary_text: A group enters a supermarket at closing time, shoots around and takes hostages. They believe aliens have arrived there then. Cops arrive outside.

name: A Christmas Carol
summary_text: An old bitter miser who makes excuses for his uncaring nature learns real compassion when three ghosts visit him on Christmas Eve.

name: 3 Ninjas Kick Back
summary_text: Young martial artists face their grandfather's foes when they accompany him to Japan to deliver a priceless dagger.

name: Hatchet III
summary_text: A search and recovery team heads into the haunted swamp to pick up the pieces, and Marybeth learns the secret to ending the voodoo curse that has left Victor Crowley haunting and terrorizing Honey Island Swamp for decades.

name: Saturn 3
summary_text: Two lovers stationed at a remote base in the asteroid fields of Saturn are intruded upon by a retentive technocrat from Earth and his charge: a malevolent eight foot robot.

name: I rymden finns inga känslor
summary_text: A younger brother with Aspergers syndrome helps his older brother find a girlfriend.

name: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
summary_text: An eccentric Scottish schoolteacher's extravagantly romantic ideas about life--and love--overly impress her young pupils and bring her into conflict with her school's conservative headmistress.

name: Screwed
summary_text: A chauffeur kidnaps his rich boss's dog to hold it for ransom, but when she accidentally gets the dog back, she thinks that it's the chauffeur who's been kidnapped.

name: Redline
summary_text: A gorgeous young automobile fanatic--and front to the hottest unsigned band on the West coast--finds herself caught up in illegal drag-racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

name: God Help the Girl
summary_text: As Eve begins writing songs as a way to sort through some emotional problems, she meets James and Cassie, two musicians each at crossroads of their own.

name: Luka Chuppi
summary_text: Pretending to be married in order to cohabitate, a small-town couple lands in endless awkward situations to hide the truth from their orthodox families.

name: The Wind and the Lion
summary_text: An Arab chief triggers an international incident when he kidnaps an American widow and her children.

name: High Strung
summary_text: Dancer Ruby, starting at Manhattan Conservatory of the Arts, meets English violinist Johnnie, playing in a subway station. Music and dance follow.

name: Santa with Muscles
summary_text: An evil millionaire believes he is Santa Claus after an accident renders him amnesiac.

name: Girlhood
summary_text: A girl with few real prospects joins a gang, reinventing herself and gaining a sense of self confidence in the process. However, she soon finds that this new life does not necessarily make her any happier.

name: Home Alone: The Holiday Heist
summary_text: Finn Baxter sets up booby traps to catch the ghost of his new home's former occupant, only to discover he must protect the house and his sister from three bumbling art thieves.

name: Amos & Andrew
summary_text: A Pulitzer prize writer buys a cabin. The neighbors get suspicious when a stranger "breaks in". They see a black man and call the police, who start shooting at him. The sheriff tries a cover-up involving a white petty crook. Bad idea.

name: Welcome to the South
summary_text: Overwhelmed by his wife, a postal worker from Northern Italy feigns disability to request a transfer to Milan. When he's unmasked, he is sent to a tiny village near Naples for two years. He...                See full summary »

name: The Balkan Line
summary_text: After the NATO bombing of Yugoslavia in 1999, the Yugoslav army pulls out of Kosovo region, leaving Serbian people at the mercy of the Albanian UCK terrorists. A small band of soldiers must take over the Slatina airport, and hold it until the Russian peacekeepers arrive.

name: The Boston Strangler
summary_text: A series of brutal murders in Boston sparks a seemingly endless and increasingly complex manhunt.

name: My One and Only
summary_text: After leaving her philandering husband, an elegant socialite takes her two sons on a road trip across America in search of a better life.

name: 13 Minutes
summary_text: In November 1939, Georg Elser's attempt to assassinate Adolf Hitler fails, and he is arrested. During his confinement, he recalls the events leading up to his plot and his reasons for deciding to take such drastic action.

name: Sergio
summary_text: A sweeping drama set in the chaotic aftermath of the US invasion of Iraq, where the life of top UN diplomat Sergio Vieira de Mello hangs in the balance during the most treacherous mission of his career.

name: Nisshartho Bhalobasha: What is Love!
summary_text: Nishwartha Bhalobasa (English: Selfless Love) is Bangladeshi romantic-action-comedy film directed by Ananta Jalil. starring Ananta and Barsha in the lead roles. The film is produced by ...                See full summary »

name: Operation Dumbo Drop
summary_text: To keep the loyalty of a village during the Vietnam war, a U.S. Army officer and his unit struggle to deliver it a live elephant.

name: The Lodgers
summary_text: A family curse confines orphaned twins Rachel and Edwards to their home, in punishment for their ancestors' sins. Bound to the rules of a haunting childhood lullaby, the twins must never let any outsiders inside the house.

name: Mind Game
summary_text: After a deadly encounter with two yakuza, a loser with a crush on his childhood girlfriend goes to heaven and back, embarking on a psychedelic self-discovery experience with her and his friends.

name: Nil by Mouth
summary_text: A rough, short-tempered patriarch of a working class family has his life and the relationships around him slowly unravel.

name: Rapid Fire
summary_text: When student Jake Lo witnesses a killing, he finds himself caught between two feuding drug lords. Betrayed and set up by the federal agents, the only person he can trust is Ryan, a Chicago cop who reminds Jake of his deceased father.

name: We're No Angels
summary_text: Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the house of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises.

name: Undertow
summary_text: A pig farmer's wife dies and he's having problems with the oldest of 2 sons. There is more trouble when his recently released from prison brother arrives.

name: Ringu 0
summary_text: In this prequel to Ring, a young Sadako becomes an actress in hopes of escaping her troubled past. But strange visions and terrifying powers begin to manifest...

name: The Dentist
summary_text: An extremely successful dentist goes off the deep end after he catches his wife cheating on him.

name: Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
summary_text: Inspired by fairytales such as Alice in Wonderland and Little Red Riding Hood, is a surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world.

name: Pumpkin
summary_text: A sorority girl finds her life falling apart after she develops romantic feelings for a mentally-challenged man.

name: One Wild Moment
summary_text: Two friends bring their daughters with them on a beach vacation and find themselves in an awkward situation. A remake of the 1977 film "Un moment d'égarement".

name: Yuva
summary_text: Michael, Arjun and Lallan, three men from three different strata of society, cross paths one morning in Calcutta and change one another's lives forever.

name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
summary_text: During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.

name: This Gun for Hire
summary_text: When assassin Philip Raven shoots a blackmailer and his beautiful female companion dead, he is paid off in marked bills by his treasonous employer who is working with foreign spies.

name: The Family Fang
summary_text: A brother and sister return to their family home in search of their world famous parents who have disappeared.

name: North Sea Texas
summary_text: A teenage boy's search for love finds him fixated on a boy who lives nearby.

name: Happy Birthday to Me
summary_text: At the snobby Crawford Academy, Virginia's group of friends start to go missing years after horrible events that happened to her as a child around her birthday.

name: Love
summary_text: A man spends years alone on a space station orbiting Earth after losing communication with Houston/Earth. Time is spent on maintenance, exercise, watching old messages and reading a journal by a soldier in the American civil war 1864.

name: Kona fer í stríð
summary_text: Halla becomes a determined environmental activist, but this threatens a long-held hope of hers.

name: Grand Prix
summary_text: American Grand Prix driver Pete Aron is fired by his Jordan-BRM racing team after a crash at Monaco that injures his British teammate, Scott Stoddard.

name: Dead Rising: Watchtower
summary_text: A group of people fight to survive in a zombie-infested town.

name: Astérix: Le secret de la potion magique
summary_text: Getafix/Panoramix decides it's time to pass the magic potion recipe on to a young, trustworthy druid. He looks all over Gaul with Asterix and Obelix as Demonix is out to get the recipe.

name: Heroic Losers
summary_text: In times of the infamous Argentinian Corralito, the neighbors of a little town trace a plan to recover the money they lost after learning that their bank manager and a corrupt lawyer have stolen it.

name: Outside Providence
summary_text: After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.

name: The Indian Runner
summary_text: A Vietnam vet comes home to his small town and finds himself in conflict with rules that his brother has vowed to uphold.

name: Black Dog
summary_text: A weapons loaded truck is shadowed by FBI and ATF. It explodes and kills the driver. Jack, just out of prison, is pressured into driving another truck from Atlanta to NJ. Things get rough when hijacking attempts are made.

name: Mobsters
summary_text: From start to finish, it's a story of friendship between four street-wise males who don't mind using violence to achieve the lives that they want. They trust no one but each other, which is vital to their success as mobsters.

name: Ironweed
summary_text: An alcoholic drifter spends Halloween in his home town of Albany, New York after returning there for the first time in decades.

name: A Cop
summary_text: After a shaky first heist, a group of thieves plan an even more elaborate and risky second heist.

name: Dolphin Tale 2
summary_text: The team of people who saved Winter's life reassemble in the wake of her surrogate mother's passing in order to find her a companion so she can remain at the Clearwater Marine Hospital.

name: Diary of a Chambermaid
summary_text: A sophisticated and self-assured woman from Paris joins a middle-class rural estate as a maid and causes quite a stir among the variously uptight, perverse and violent inhabitants.

name: True Legend
summary_text: China, 1861: After rescuing the Qing prince from rebels, General Su retires to start a martial arts school. His foster brother betrays him and Su barely survives. Su has a new enemy to defeat.

name: Keulraesik
summary_text: A college student finds a diary detailing a long-ago love triangle involving her mother, her future father, and his best friend.

name: Highwaymen
summary_text: Rennie Cray (Caviezel) embarks on a bloodthirsty rampage to avenge the death of his wife who was struck down by a serial killer - a man who hunts and kills women using his '72 El Dorado.

name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
summary_text: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

name: Fong juk
summary_text: A friendship is formed between an ex-gangster, and two groups of hitmen - those who want to protect him and those who were sent to kill him.

name: The Real McCoy
summary_text: A woman is released from prison, an expert bank robber who wants to settle down and go straight, but her parole officer and her former employer try to get her to pull one more heist.

name: Gone in 60 Seconds
summary_text: When a South American drug lord pays Pace to steal 48 cars for him, all but one is in the bag - thereby, the police precipitate in a desperate car chase against Pace and his Eleanor across Southern California.

name: The Year Without a Santa Claus
summary_text: When a weary and discouraged Santa Claus considers skipping his Christmas Eve run one year, Mrs. Claus and his Elves set out to change his mind.

name: Atharintiki Daaredi
summary_text: The scion of a powerful family is tasked with retrieving an estranged family member.

name: The Blue Elephant 2
summary_text: A meeting with a new inmate in the psychiatric hospital flips Dr. Yehia's life upside down, he prophesies that the death of his entire family is only three days away.

name: Thalaivaa
summary_text: A son steps into his father's shoes, has to win a bloody war before he becomes the leader.

name: The Sleepover
summary_text: When two siblings discover their seemingly normal mom is a former thief in witness protection who has been forced to pull one last job, they team up to rescue her over the course of an action-packed night.

name: Gloria
summary_text: A story set in Santiago and centered on Gloria, a free-spirited older woman, and the realities of her whirlwind relationship with a former naval officer whom she meets out in the clubs.

name: The Air Up There
summary_text: A basketball coach travels to Africa to recruit a new star.

name: Thunderbolt
summary_text: In order to release his kidnapped sister, sports car mechanic Chan Foh To (Jackie Chan) has to beat a supercriminal street racer.

name: A Fox's Tale
summary_text: Little Jack is a young fox living happily with his family in the woods, but everything changes when his father is captured by a circus troupe in order to be part of their show. The rest of ...                See full summary »

name: Dave Chappelle: The Bird Revelation
summary_text: Dave jokes about the sexual assaults dominating the 2017 entertainment news and how and why people allow themselves to be abused.

name: Exists
summary_text: A group of friends who venture into the remote Texas woods for a party weekend find themselves stalked by Bigfoot.

name: Mamma Roma
summary_text: Having renounced her ignominious past, a former streetwalker reunites with her son. However, an extortion scheme endangers her aspirations for a decent bourgeois life. Can she protect him from the same snares that wounded her youth?

name: Kutsal Damacana
summary_text: Fikret goes to Istanbul. Would hope that will be a great opportunity for their lives against a day Asim learned from him.

name: Incendiary
summary_text: A woman's life is forever changed when tragedy strikes at a soccer match.

name: The Hamiltons
summary_text: Four young adult siblings, who harbor some dark secrets, try to fend for themselves after the mysterious death of their parents.

name: The Great White Hype
summary_text: The boxing champ's promoter thinks, change is needed. He finds the one man, who's beaten his black champ (at 17), a white man now in a rock band. Like Rocky, he trains heavily whereas the champ slacks.

name: The Kid Detective
summary_text: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 32, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries between hangovers and bouts of self-pity. Until a naive client brings him his first 'adult' case, to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend.

name: Oasis
summary_text: An irresponsible and childish ex-con befriends a girl with cerebral palsy and develops a progressively stronger bond with her.

name: Dogfight
summary_text: Before leaving to fight in Vietnam, a group of teenagers play a game where they try to seduce the ugliest girl they can find.

name: Office Romance
summary_text: The life of entire statistical bureau becomes crazy when an ordinary worker, a shy man, falls in love with a boss, a strict woman.

name: Criminal Activities
summary_text: Four young men make a risky investment together that puts them in trouble with the mob.

name: Big Time Adolescence
summary_text: A suburban teenager comes of age under the destructive guidance of his best friend, an aimless college dropout.

name: No Deposit
summary_text: A story about a family man's fall from grace through a series of downward spiraling events beyond his control. With his life turned upside down, he hooks up with the wrong people and things take a turn for the worst with almost no way out.

name: Young Einstein
summary_text: Albert Einstein turns the science community upside down with his discoveries including a formula to put bubbles back in beer and rock n' roll.

name: Ma vie en rose
summary_text: Ludovic is an innocent seven-year-old child who provokes horror in his community when he dresses in girls clothes and insists he's a girl.

name: The Big Fat Stone
summary_text: A modern day tale about a homeless man who by simply being at the right place at the right time, gets a chance at a new life. We learn that in a single minute, in a single second, with a simple twist of fate, everything can change forever.

name: Davaro: Son Eskiya
summary_text: Memo returns from Germany to get married with his love but his father's killer Sulo is released from jail. In accordance with the blood feud, he has to get revenge for his fahter or he can ...                See full summary »

name: The Mangler
summary_text: A laundry-folding machine has been possessed by a demon, causing it to develop homicidal tendencies.

name: Ballet Shoes
summary_text: The story of three orphan girls - Pauline (Emma Watson), Petrova (Yasmin Paige), and Posy (Lucy Boynton) - adopted by an eccentric explorer, Great Uncle Matthew (Richard Griffiths), and his niece Sylvia Brown (Emilia Fox), in 1930s London.

name: Who's the Man?
summary_text: The two worst barbers in Harlem become cops while a real estate developer forces people out of Harlem.

name: I Call First
summary_text: J.R. is a typical Italian-American on the streets of New York. When he gets involved with a local girl, he decides to get married and settle down, but when he learns that she was once raped...                See full summary »

name: Catacombs
summary_text: Vic visits her sister in Paris. She parties in the catacombs under Paris with her sister and her friends on her first night in France. Remains of 6,000,000+ people is there. Something evil chases her there.

name: The Puppet Masters
summary_text: The Earth is invaded by stingray-shaped alien "slugs" that ride on people's backs and control their minds.

name: Wolves
summary_text: A boy is trying to find out about his family history and stumbles upon a town of lycans.

name: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum
summary_text: A wily Roman slave schemes to earn his freedom by romantically uniting his master with a courtesan. But matters get complicated and he ends up dragging in his neighbors around him, leading to chaos.

name: Trust the Man
summary_text: After much drama, cheating, and trial separations, two men fight to save their respective relationships.

name: Irreplaceable You
summary_text: A couple who have known each other since 8 are destined to be together until death do them apart.

name: Escape from Sobibor
summary_text: German death camp in Sobibor, Poland, killed two hundred fifty thousand Jews. It had the most successful prisoner escape in World War II on October 14, 1943.

name: Surfer, Dude
summary_text: A wave twisting tale of a soul searching surfer experiencing an existential crisis.

name: Mavi Boncuk
summary_text: 4 friends who are mistreated in a casino want to revenge by kidnapping the singer of the casino.

name: Teen Witch
summary_text: High school misfit Louise, at a loss for romance, discovers magical abilities, but the teenage witch finds that she cannot conjure herself true love, so what?

name: Bedazzled
summary_text: A hapless loser sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but has trouble winning over the girl of his dreams.

name: Girl House
summary_text: A beautiful young college student moves into a house that streams video to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the site and finds out where she lives, she spends the night fighting for her life.

name: Soul Survivors
summary_text: A college student is caught between the world of the living and the dead.

name: Lola Versus
summary_text: Dumped by her boyfriend just three weeks before their wedding, Lola enlists her close friends for a series of adventures she hopes will help her come to terms with approaching 30 as a single woman.

name: Soy Cuba
summary_text: Four vignettes about the lives of the Cuban people set during the pre-revolutionary era.

name: Liza the Fox-Fairy
summary_text: Liza's a nurse, seeking love. Her only company is a long-dead Japanese pop star, who turns her into a fox-fairy out of jealousy. Now, every men who desires Liza shall die horribly. Can she overcome the curse?

name: Gladiator
summary_text: Tommy Riley has moved with his dad to Chicago from a 'nice place'. He keeps to himself, goes to school. However, after a street fight he is noticed and quickly falls into the world of illegal underground boxing - where punches can kill.

name: The Babymakers
summary_text: After failing to get his wife pregnant, a guy (Schneider) recruits his pals to steal the deposit he left at a sperm bank years ago.

name: The Fall of the Roman Empire
summary_text: The death of Marcus Aurelius leads to a succession crisis, in which the deceased emperor's son, Commodus, demonstrates that he is unwilling to let anything undermine his claim to the Roman Empire.

name: Life Partners
summary_text: Sasha and Paige's co-dependent friendship is tested as Paige gets serious with a guy for the first time.

name: MSG 2 the Messenger
summary_text: MSG 2 The Messenger is based on true events of Dera Sacha Sauda in years 2000-2001. Although the main story line is true, action & comedy is added for entertainment. Saint Gurmeet Ram Rahim...                See full summary »

name: Don't Torture a Duckling
summary_text: A reporter and a promiscuous young woman try to solve a series of child killings in a remote southern Italian town rife with superstition and a distrust of outsiders.

name: Win It All
summary_text: A small-time gambler agrees to stash a bag for an acquaintance who is heading to prison. When he discovers cash in the bag, he can't resist the urge to dip into the funds.

name: Faults
summary_text: A cult deprogrammer must help a couple whose daughter has recently joined a cult.

name: The Treatment
summary_text: Inspector Nick Cafmeyer seems to have it all - looks, brains and a successful career. But a dark cloud hangs over his life: since the age of nine, he has been haunted by the unsolved ...                See full summary »

name: LOL (Laughing Out Loud) ®
summary_text: When Lola's boyfriend is unfaithful to her on his summer holiday, she dumps him and flirts with his best friend as punishment. But as their class prepares to leave on an excursion to London, the relationship heats up.

name: The Crow: Wicked Prayer
summary_text: On his way to becoming an immortal demon, a gang leader orchestrates the murder of an ex-con and his girlfriend.

name: Alone in Berlin
summary_text: After a Nazi German working class couple loses their son in World War II, they decide to retaliate by secretly leafletting handwritten cards in Berlin denouncing their government.

name: Port of Shadows
summary_text: A military deserter finds love and trouble (and a small dog) in a smoky French port city.

name: Custody
summary_text: A broken marriage leads to a bitter custody battle with an embattled son at the centre.

name: Housefull 3
summary_text: A father doesn't want his three daughters to get married. Now, it's up to three men to try to and convince the father that they're a good fit for his daughters.

name: The Unknown Girl
summary_text: A doctor gets obsessed with the case of a dead woman after learning that the woman had died shortly after having rung her door for help.

name: Agneepath
summary_text: A young boy's quest for revenge leads him to become a gangster as an adult, and with each day he becomes more and more like his enemies. Can he find vengeance and redemption?

name: Little Fish
summary_text: A woman trying to escape her past becomes embroiled in a drug deal.

name: A Midnight Clear
summary_text: This WW2 psychological drama plays out at Christmas. US GIs hold an isolated cabin in the Ardennes against a handful of Germans cut off from their main force. Combat-weary and short of rations, both sides are determined to survive.

name: See You Up There
summary_text: November 1919. Two soldiers - a disfigured but brilliant artist and an ex-accountant - start a memorial con. But in the France of the Roaring Twenties, their adventures soon turn dangerous.

name: Afro Samurai: Resurrection
summary_text: When his father's body is stolen from its grave, Afro takes up his sword again to tear through an army of deadly foes led by a sadistic leader.

name: The Party
summary_text: This is the story about a teenage girl's first love experiences.

name: Going Places
summary_text: Two whimsical, aimless thugs harass and assault women, steal, murder, and alternately charm, fight, or sprint their way out of trouble. They take whatever the bourgeois characters value: ...                See full summary »

name: Taxi 5
summary_text: A police officer who's transferred in the police of Marseilles gets assigned to take down a group of Italian robbers who drive the powerful Ferraris with the older nephew of Daniel, a terrible driver who gets the legendary white taxi.

name: Island of Lost Souls
summary_text: A mad doctor conducts ghastly genetic experiments on a remote island in the South Seas, much to the fear and disgust of the shipwrecked sailor who finds himself trapped there.

name: The Body Snatcher
summary_text: A ruthless doctor and his young prize student find themselves continually harassed by their murderous supplier of illegal cadavers.

name: Harper
summary_text: Lew Harper, a cool private investigator, is hired by a wealthy California matron to locate her kidnapped husband.

name: The Phantom of the Opera at the Royal Albert Hall
summary_text: A disfigured musical genius, hidden away in the Paris Opera House, terrorizes the opera company for the unwitting benefit of a young protégée whom he trains and loves.

name: Soleil rouge
summary_text: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.

name: Vakeel Saab
summary_text: Drama film centers on the life of a criminal lawyer.

name: Mei ren yu
summary_text: Shan, a mermaid, is sent to assassinate Xuan, a developer who threatens the ecosystem of her race, but ends up falling in love with him instead.

name: The Mummy
summary_text: In 1895, British archaeologists find and open the tomb of Egyptian Princess Ananka with nefarious consequences.

name: All Cheerleaders Die
summary_text: A rebel girl signs up a group of cheerleaders to help her take down the captain of their high school football team, but a supernatural turn of events thrusts the girls into a different battle.

name: Butterfly
summary_text: For Moncho, it's an idyllic year: he starts school, he has a wonderful teacher, he makes a friend in Roque, he begins to figure out some of the mysteries of Eros, and, with his older ...                See full summary »

name: Dark Tide
summary_text: A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever.

name: King Cobra
summary_text: Veteran gay pornography producer Stephen battles two rival producers over the rights to his underage porn star creation, Brent Corrigan, with deadly results.

name: The Hero
summary_text: An ailing movie star comes to terms with his past and mortality.

name: Charlie
summary_text: A young, nonconforming woman named Tessa gets entangled in a cat-and-mouse chase in the by-lanes of Kerala, hunting for a mysterious artist who previously lived in her apartment.

name: The Hunter's Prayer
summary_text: An assassin helps a young woman avenge the death of her family.

name: Red Riding: The Year of Our Lord 1980
summary_text: A team of investigators attempt to stop a serial killer known as the Yorkshire Ripper from claiming his next victim, but uncover something far more terrifying.

name: Nappily Ever After
summary_text: Violet Jones tired of waiting for her longtime boyfriend to propose, breaks up with him. But old feelings, and heaps of jealousy, no doubt, arise when he promptly begins dating another woman.

name: Good Morning
summary_text: Two boys begin a silence strike to press their parents into buying them a television set.

name: Viral
summary_text: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.

name: The Forsaken
summary_text: A young man gets embroiled in a war against vampires.

name: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
summary_text: Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.

name: Blow the Man Down
summary_text: Mary Beth and Priscilla Connolly attempt to cover up a gruesome run-in with a dangerous man. To conceal their crime, the sisters must go deep into the criminal underbelly of their hometown, uncovering the town's darkest secrets.

name: Eden
summary_text: A young Korean-American girl, abducted and forced into prostitution by domestic human traffickers, cooperates with her captors in a desperate ploy to survive.

name: Goodachari
summary_text: A young NSA agent is framed for the murder of his bosses making him realize that now his mission is darker than expected and has some personal scores to settle regarding his father's death, a former NSA agent.

name: Mortal Thoughts
summary_text: Two detectives interrogate a hairdresser on two homicides she may or may not have been involved in.

name: The Comancheros
summary_text: Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teamed with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves dealing with the Comanches known as Comancheros.

name: Nowhere
summary_text: Follows a day in the lives of a group of Los Angeles high school students and the strange lives they lead.

name: Under the Sand
summary_text: When her husband goes missing at the beach, a female professor begins to mentally disintegrate as her denial of his disappearance becomes delusional.

name: Les affamés
summary_text: In a small, remote village in northern Quebec, things have changed. Locals are not the same anymore - their bodies are breaking down and they have turned against their loved ones. A handful of survivors goes hiding in the woods, looking for others like them.

name: The Roundup
summary_text: A faithful retelling of the 1942 "Vel' d'Hiv Roundup" and the events surrounding it.

name: The Little Mermaid
summary_text: A young reporter and his niece discover a beautiful and enchanting creature they believe to be the real little mermaid.

name: Red Scorpion
summary_text: A Soviet Special Forces soldier is sent on a mission to infiltrate an African rebel army and assassinate its leader, but the war machine they trained starts to think for himself.

name: Christmas in Connecticut
summary_text: A food writer who has lied about being the perfect housewife must try to cover her deception when her boss and a returning war hero invite themselves to her home for a traditional family Christmas.

name: Dirty Deeds
summary_text: A high school has a tradition of dirty deeds the night before homecoming (if there's any volunteer) where, to win, the person performs 10 dirty deeds in 12 hours. Will Harper make it?

name: Lorna's Silence
summary_text: Sokol and Lorna, two Albanian emigrants in Belgium, dream of leaving their dreary jobs to set up a snack bar. They need money, and a permanent resident status. Claudy is a junkie - he needs...                See full summary »

name: Personal Effects
summary_text: A 24 y.o. wrestler/McJob man meets a mom 20+ years older at group therapy for family of murder victims (sister and husband). He helps her deaf teenage son. She invites him to weddings. They await convictions on the murder trials.

name: I'll Sleep When I'm Dead
summary_text: A former gangster reenters the criminal underworld after his brother suspiciously commits suicide.

name: Antonia's Line
summary_text: A Dutch matron establishes and, for several generations, oversees a close-knit, matriarchal community where feminism and liberalism thrive.

name: November Criminals
summary_text: After his friend is murdered, a Washington, D.C. teenager undertakes his own investigation of the crime.

name: Come and Find Me
summary_text: When his girlfriend goes missing, David must track down her whereabouts after he realizes she's not who she was pretending to be.

name: Bad Timing/A Sensual Obsession
summary_text: A psychiatrist, living in Vienna, enters a torrid relationship with a married woman. When she ends up in the hospital from an overdose, an inspector becomes set on discovering the demise of their affair.

name: Kara Bela
summary_text: After the death of his wife and father, Kudret, who has always lived by the book, decides to go on a road trip to save a girl.

name: The Killing Gene
summary_text: A calculating killer coerces a detective to pay for his previous mistakes.

name: Another Day in Paradise
summary_text: In the hope of a big score, two junkie couples team up to commit various drug robberies which go disastrously wrong leading to dissent, violence and murder.

name: Before and After
summary_text: Two parents deal with the effects when their son is accused of murdering his girlfriend.
